minecraftmpris.config.title: Configure MinecraftMPRIS
minecraftmpris.config.description.x_offs: How much to offset the overlay horizontally from the corner.
minecraftmpris.config.description.y_offs: How much to offset the overlay vertically from the corner.
minecraftmpris.config.description.anchor: The corner that the overlay aligns to.
minecraftmpris.config.description.show_b: Whether to show a background behind the overlay.
minecraftmpris.config.description.overla: Width of the overlay (excluding album art).
minecraftmpris.config.description.album_: Size of the album art (recommended: height - 10).
minecraftmpris.config.description.show_a: Whether to show the currently playing track's album art.
Whether to show the currently playing track's artist.
minecraftmpris.config.description.show_c: Whether to show elapsed and total time.
minecraftmpris.config.description.show_p: Whether to show the progress bar.
minecraftmpris.config.description.show_t: Whether to show shadow behind text.
